title: (x) Swashy italic serif face on Kvadrat posters - Bookman Italic Swash {Stephen}
content: â€¦does this exist as a font or has it been redrawn. Just a screen grab but hopefully enough to identify. [http://www.dag-knudsen.com/#/gallery/02\_commercial/02\_commercial/014.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090423190555/http:/www.dag-knudsen.com/#/gallery/02_commercial/02_commercial/014.jpg "http://www.dag-knudsen.com/#/gallery/02\_commercial/02\_commercial/014.jpg")
author: david@mild

comments.content: There are two digital versions of Bookman Swash. From [ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20090423190555/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_bookman_std_medium/&sample_text=See%20swashes%20below.&acs_ss=8) and [Jukebox](http://web.archive.org/web/20090423190555/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000085). This one is the latter.
